name: steamroller
effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

Power is doubled against Pokémon that have used minimize since entering the field.

flavor_text_entries.black-white:
The user crushes its targets by rolling
over them with its rolled-up body.
This attack may make the target flinch.
